features: 360° Rotating Bookshelves: This 5-tier tall bookshelvese is equipped with turnplate on the bottom. On the front and back sides, you can store and display kinds of books, magazines, photos, plants and collections. Compared with traditional bookshelves, it adds a lot of artistry and flexibility. It is nice design to meet your needs for home and office.

5-Tier Large Capacity: Tall bookshelf can save much space, which is ideal for corners and small spaces. 5-tier bookshelf has large capacity. On each tier storage area, you can put 7-12 regular books and numbers of magazines. Also, tall bookshelf is suitable as storage rack shelf, display shelf, plant shelf, ect. Product dimensions: 57.87"(H) x 11.81"(L) x 11.81"(W)

Sturdy and Durable: With the superior metal frame and thick solid panel, the bookcase can hold up to heavry books. Each board has a strong load-bearing capacity of 35lbs. During the entire rotation process of the bookcase, it will not have any shaking after putting the heavy books. Being made of high-quality material, its durability and stability fits for storage needs.

Elegant Design Style: The brown wooden board with a retro flavor combined with black iron frame can be well fit into the home decoration. Whether in the living room, bedroom, study room or office, this book shelf can be used to store or display your items. Not only is it waterproof, it's also scratch-resistant.

Easy Assembly & Professional Service: Making it easier to complete the installation, the bookshelves comes with step-by-step instructions and all marked tool parts. If you have any questions about our product, please feel free to reach out. We will always try best to serve our customers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and solid shelf with options for tall books
reviews.reviewText: I moved to a new apartment and lost the scattered but small spaces I used to for my book collection. It was nice to keep the similar ones next to each other, and I didn't want a wide shelf eating up all my floor space. When I decided to look into rotating shelves for the new place, I immediately ran into a problem: the height of Japanese art books and piano sheet music books. These are about a quarter to a half inch too tall for most rotating shelves.This shelf provides 2 unique solutions to my problem. First, the top shelf is completely open on top, so I can fill that whole shelf with books of any height. Second the lips meant for displaying something opposite the main shelf space is the perfect place to lay a tall book or three on its side (works perfect for long books too). My collection isn't huge, but thanks to these two features, all of my books fit with room for temporarily parking library books too. I even got my crazy 12in x 15.5in huge book on there, which was a problem even for regular shelves.Now I might put a mat or board underneath it later, as its sitting on carpet and takes 2 hands to spin due to the friction. That's not the shelf's fault though. I couldn't be happier with this shelf. All of my books have an easy to access home now. And the display shelves have turned my favorite books into decoration. The whole thing is sturdy and stylish. Even with my heaviest books on the top shelf, it feels solid, like it would be hard to tip over.If, like me, your book collection is 1/4 big books, this shelf will work well for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this shelf. Better for books bigger then a paperback novel. I can't wait to order more of these. They take up so little space. I'm not one to put together furniture so it took me a leisurely hour.Eta: HEY if yours wobbles, try balancing the weight evenly thru out the shelves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This rotating shelf maximizes limited space. It fits a variety of different-sized objects, including books. The top shelf’s open design accommodates any book height. It's sturdy and stylish and seems well-made. It really feels like quality on a budget.Assembly was easy, though it's slightly challenging to spin on carpet due to friction. You have to be careful not to make it too top-heavy, so put heavier items on bottom to balance it out.My daughter helped put it together and she thought it was easy enough. Really satisfied, would buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's super sturdy, first of all, which I think is what matters above all. It's perfectly functional and it's held up about two months later with constant use.I pack this with me to shows for my job and I use it as a display for items for sale.The rotation is pretty much perfect, and is made even smoother/silent if you apply some grease to the swivel base.I love the rustic/industrial aesthetic, it goes well with any environment or venue. Love this thing!The shelves are reversible so if you want to have the backboards all facing the same way forward, you can do that. OR you can just not install the backboards at all and be totally fine. So there's a good bit of modularity here.
